basic.description: This course focuses on selected topics in contemporary biological science; maximum enrollment of five students in each tutorial. May be repeated to a maximum of two hours.
basic.subject: BSC
basic.title: Senior Tutorial in Biological Science

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: BSC 2010, BSC 21010L, BSC 2011, BSC 2011L, CHM 1045, CHM 1045L, CHM 1046, CHM 1046L, Senior standing.
